com.socialmanager

Class PlatformAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socialmanager.PlatformAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RenrenAdapter, TencentQQAdapter, WeiboAdapter

    public abstract class PlatformAdapter
extends Object
    Adapter to uniform different platforms
    Author:
    eryx.kao@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void authorize(Activity activity)
      Request authorization, will callback to SocialActionListener if set
      abstract void getUserInfo()
      Request user info, note that authorize(Activity) should be completed first
      abstract boolean isAuthorized()
      Check if certain context has authorize info
      abstract void logout()
      Request logout, will cleanup corresponding access_token and user data, etc.
      abstract void onActivityResult(Bundle values)
      Should be called in Activity#onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) when using SSO authorization method
      void setListener(SocialActionListener listener)
      Set up callback listener
      abstract void share(Activity activity, Bundle values)
      Request share, note that authorize(Activity) should be completed first

        Check if certain context has authorize info
        Returns:
        true if the authorizing info is valid

        public abstract void authorize(Activity activity)
        Request authorization, will callback to SocialActionListener if set

        Request logout, will cleanup corresponding access_token and user data, etc.

      • onActivityResult

        public abstract void onActivityResult(Bundle values)
        Should be called in Activity#onActivityResult(int, int, Intent) when using SSO authorization method
        Parameters:
        values - Bundle value containing SSO authorization callback data
